channel.title: [317][pi]Webclient error, please help!
channel.description: I jarred the client and packed cache, and cache downloader works, but when i put it on the host, i go to the site, and it says unexpected error - retrying in [] seconds, then i refresh and it says this : [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=14&u=16918657][img]http://i41.servimg.com/u/f41/16/91/86/57/webcli11.jpg[/img][/url] [size=24pt]IT WORKS WHEN I RUN JARRED CLIENT ON DESKTOP, but NOT when I upload to host and Run on THERE[/size]

item.title: [317][pi]Webclient error, please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

I jarred the client and packed cache, and cache downloader works, but when i put it on the host, i go to the site, and it says unexpected error - retrying in [] seconds, then i refresh and it says this :

[size=24pt]IT WORKS WHEN I RUN JARRED CLIENT ON DESKTOP, but NOT when I upload to host and Run on THERE[/size]
